Autism Test (Child) - App Description

Brief:
The Autism Test (Child) app is designed as a preliminary screening tool for parents who suspect their child may be dealing with autism spectrum disorder (ASD). While not a diagnostic tool, it offers critical insights that can prompt early intervention, vital for the childâ€™s development.
